channel.title: Posts on huyixi's TILs
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on huyixi's TILs

item.title: 通才如何学习
item.description: 文摘 How generalists learn 通才如何学习 [you] don’t need to learn everything up front, [you] just need to be confident enough that [you] can learn anything when [you] need to 你不需要预先学习所有的东西，你只需要有足够的信心，这样当你需要的时候，你就能学到任何东西 I’ve never really understood why I struggled to follow a textbook from start to finish. What I now realise is I lacked a goal. Learning algorithm X or method Y for its own sake isn’t an interesting enough goal. Solving a problem, answering a question (however trivial) - those are.
